node.title: Grieving father urges young drivers to 'be the change you want to see on the road'
node.description: As a grief-stricken family prepares for their first Christmas since their teenage son was killed in a car crash, Queensland is at risk of recording its highest road toll since 2009 as authorities brace for a busy holiday season when the border opens.
node.content:
["As a grief-stricken family prepares for their first Christmas since their teenage son was killed in a car crash,\u00a0Queensland is at risk of recording its highest road toll since 2009 as authorities brace for a busy holiday season when the border opens on December 13.", "As of December 7, families are mourning the deaths of 266 people killed in road crashes since January, which is 12 more than the same time last year.", "In 2020, 278 people were killed on the state's roads.", "If the road toll ends up exceeding the 280 people killed in 2012, it will be the worst result since 2009, when\u00a0331 people lost their lives.", "Shane Yore will spend his first Christmas without his son Rhys, who was killed in a road crash in Yeppoon\u00a0in central Queensland\u00a0in January this year.", "", "
Rhys Yore (far right) with his parents Mandy and Shane and his brother Mitchell.(Supplied: Shane Yore)
", "The 16-year-old died when the car in which he was a passenger crashed into the wall of a bridge.", "\"Rhys was \u2014\u00a0along with our other son Mitchell \u2014 he was our lives,\" Mr Yore said.", "\"Rhys was incredibly full of life \u2014\u00a0as he got to his teenage years, he really inspired us, he inspired us to live a full and good life \u2014\u00a0he was everything.\"", "", "
Rhys has been described by his family as \"inspirational\"\u00a0and \"full of life\".(Supplied: Shane Yore)
", "The Rockhampton District Court heard in September that the driver of the car, Owen Andrew Dendle \u2014\u00a0who was 18 at the time \u2014\u00a0had been driving dangerously for 328 metres before he crashed.", "Dendle pleaded guilty to one count of dangerous operation of a motor vehicle causing death and was sentenced to four-and-a-half years in prison, suspended after 12 months.", "Mr Yore said his family had been shattered.", "", "
Rhys was killed in January 2021.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "\"Psychologically, I haven't recovered from coming across the incident on the bridge that night \u2014\u00a0from the 21st of January this year I'm a different person,\" he said.", "\"I've failed to recover a lot of the cognitive functions that you need for day-to-day living \u2014 memory, multi-tasking.", "", "
The guard rail\u00a0from the bridge where Rhys was killed has been used in a memorial garden.(ABC News: Erin Semmler)
", "
'Be the change you want to see on the road'
", "Mr Yore said he was determined to do what he could to improve the behaviour of young drivers.\u00a0", "\"It has to start from the bottom up \u2014\u00a0a concerted effort to change driving culture in young people has to start with them, has to start with the youth,\" he said.", "\"You've got to want to stay alive, you've got to want to see your family and grow up and have families of your own.", "\"Be the change you want to see on the road.\"\u00a0", "", "
Mr Yore says he is determined to do what he can to improve the behaviour of young drivers.\u00a0(ABC News: Erin Semmler)
", "
'Fatal five' to blame for most road deaths
", "Acting Superintendent Stephen Donnelly\u00a0from the Road Policing Group\u00a0said the so-called \"fatal five\"\u00a0\u2014 speed, seatbelts, alcohol/drugs, fatigue and distraction \u2014 were to blame for most road deaths.", "\"We've got people still engaging in behaviours in motor vehicles that are not appropriate \u2014\u00a0they're taking risks, showing disrespect for other road users, not taking responsibility for their actions, and just basically engaging in very stupid behaviour.\"", "Acting Superintendent Donnelly said the COVID-19 pandemic had also played a role.", "\"In Queensland, we saw an increase in the speeds being detected on the static cameras, the mobile cameras, and we've seen an increase in the percentage of people that are detected drink-driving vs the amount of enforcement.\"", "", "
Acting Superintendent Stephen Donnelly says changing human behaviour on the roads is \u201cthe biggest challenge\u201d for police.(ABC News: Emma Pollard)
", "
Some still not wearing seatbelts\u00a0
", "Shockingly, some drivers are not wearing seatbelts.", "\"That's part of a larger trend where it's almost like we have a generation now that needs re-educating because we\u00a0all went through that period where it's now just second nature to wear your seatbelt, but we are seeing people killed simply because\u00a0they didn't have their seatbelt on.\"", "Authorities hope new covert police cameras designed to catch drivers using their mobile phones, or not wearing seatbelts, will help improve road safety.", "
Spike in motorbike fatalities
", "There has also been a rise in the number of motorcycle fatalities, with 64 riders and pillion passengers killed as of December 7\u00a0\u2013 an increase of more than 35 per cent on the five-year average.", "Marnie Dennis owns Ride Smart, a motorcycle training group that runs the compulsory Q-Ride courses that motorbike riders must complete to get their licence.", "She said it was \"heartbreaking beyond words\" when motorcycle riders died on the road.", "", "
Marnie Dennis has been in the motorbike training industry for 30 years.(ABC News: Mark Leonardi\u00a0)
", "She said the COVID-19 pandemic had\u00a0kept them busy.", "\"Since COVID, people have been kept stationary in Queensland, this beautiful state of ours, and obviously to ride a motorcycle gives them freedom,\" she said.", "Ms Dennis said anyone returning after a long break from riding should consider doing a refresher safety course.", "\"Motorcycles have changed over the years,\" she said.", "\"Recently we had a gentleman that returned after 20 years of not being on a motorcycle, so his skill set he thought was still quite good until he actually got on the motorbike again.\"", "", "
Anyone returning after a long break from riding a motorbike should also consider doing a refresher safety course.(ABC News: Mark Leonardi\u00a0)
", "
'Risk-taking' motorcycle riders
", "Acting Superintendent Donnelly said police saw\u00a0\"a lot of risk-taking\" by weekend recreational motorcycle riders, sometimes resulting in fatalities.", "\"The majority of those are motorcyclists at fault and we see quite a large percentage where the rider has made poor decisions in terms of exceeding either their own ability, the capability of the machine they're on, or the conditions of the road,\" he said.", "", "
Police said they saw a lot of risk-taking\u00a0by weekend recreational motorcycle riders.(ABC News: Mark Leonardi\u00a0)
", "Acting Superintendent Donnelly urged drivers to be cautious as this festive season would also coincide with the lifting of COVID-19 border restrictions.", "\"We expect to see quite a substantial increase in traffic volume,\" he said.", "\"At Christmas we see people that are pushing the limits of driving fatigue, allowing themselves to be distracted because they're travelling with the family, and we see people mixing drinking with driving.\"", "The Christmas road safety campaign runs from December 11 to January 28.", "", "
The bridge where Rhys\u00a0died has been renamed in his memory.(ABC News: Erin Semmler)
"]
